title: Anyone willing to give me advice on my Bronze Games if i send a replay?
body:
I'm currently in low b2 after going on tilt post going 2 and 3 in my silver promos, and I kinda want to make silver within the season. If I could find out how to send someone a replay (Suggestions would be appreciated) would anyone be willing to give me advice on the game?
Thanks

replies.body: What roll(s) are you playing? I might be able to help in some rolls but probably not mid...
I could send you one for any role, but i mainly play JG Rengar

Ah sweet! I probably won't be able to help a huge amount but i wouldn't mind just having a look :) as for sending the game files, would it work better to send through google drive, drop box or email? something like that?

> [{quoted}](name=nice guys,realm=BR,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=IandwgfR,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-31T13:43:34.961+0000)
>
> Ah sweet! I probably won't be able to help a huge amount but i wouldn't mind just having a look :) as for sending the game files, would it work better to send through google drive, drop box or email? something like that?

I've got a replay on Drive, but ive got it as the raw replay file (from BaronReplays.) If you have/could get the program you could just import it, but otherwise we might have to think of an alternative.
If you'd still be up to look add me in Client and ill share it with you on Drive?
Sweet I have Baron Replay. I'll add you in game now :)
I can give you some important teachings on this man! If you would appreciate it!
Just get someone to spectate your games and take notes.
PM me and we can talk about it :)
games just arent your thing man. look elsewhere for a hobby.
